description:
Baron Ashura`s all-out assault on Japan doesn`t stop with just Mechanical Beasts. A group of deadly assassin androids assault the Kurogane House, but the Kurogane Five is there to stop them!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ¡Muro de acero!¡Los cinco de la mansión Kurogane!
鉄壁! くろがね五人衆!
